title: Organize certifications in a grid layout

requirements.summary: Refactor the CertificationsGallery component to organize all 54 certification images in a structured grid layout with consistent spacing, alignment, and uniform card dimensions
acceptanceCriteria: All certification images are displayed in a uniform grid with consistent card sizes
Grid maintains proper spacing between items using gap utilities
Each certification card has equal width and height within the grid
Grid preserves existing hover effects and click-to-expand modal functionality
Layout remains responsive across mobile, tablet, and desktop breakpoints

file_operations.description: Refactor the component to render all 54 certification images in a structured grid container with uniform card dimensions, consistent gap spacing, and preserved hover effects and modal functionality. Ensure each certification card maintains equal width and height using aspect-ratio utilities or fixed dimensions.

requirements.summary: Implement a responsive grid system for the CertificationsGallery that displays 1 column on mobile (sm), 2 columns on tablet (md), 3 columns on larger tablets (lg), and 4 columns on desktop (xl) screens
acceptanceCriteria: Grid uses Tailwind's responsive grid utilities (grid-cols-1, md:grid-cols-2, lg:grid-cols-3, xl:grid-cols-4)
Column counts adjust smoothly at each breakpoint
Grid maintains visual balance at all screen sizes
No horizontal overflow occurs on any device size

file_operations.description: Apply Tailwind responsive grid utilities to the gallery container using grid-cols-1 for mobile, md:grid-cols-2 for tablets, lg:grid-cols-3 for larger tablets, and xl:grid-cols-4 for desktop screens. Ensure smooth breakpoint transitions and prevent horizontal overflow at all viewport sizes.

requirements.summary: Apply consistent styling to each certification card in the grid including aspect ratio preservation, border radius, shadow effects, and background color matching the portfolio's design system
acceptanceCriteria: Each card uses aspect-ratio or object-fit to maintain consistent dimensions
Cards have rounded corners using border-radius utilities
Cards include subtle shadow effects (e.g., shadow-md or shadow-lg)
Background colors align with the existing slate/teal color scheme
Certification images are centered and properly contained within their cards

file_operations.description: Style each certification card with aspect-ratio or object-fit utilities to maintain consistent dimensions, apply rounded corners with border-radius utilities (e.g., rounded-lg), add subtle shadow effects (shadow-md or shadow-lg), use slate/teal background colors from the existing design system, and ensure images are centered and properly contained using object-cover or object-contain with proper alignment.
